column1: 1320408710817042432 2020-10-25 12:55:43 -0400 <DennisPrager> What did World Opinion do for six million Jews? For a million and half Armenians I? For 60 million Chinese under Mao? Six million Ukrainians under Stalin? For the Tutsis slaughtered by the Hutus in Rwanda?  Nothing.

column3: the left
column4: always speaks of the importance of World Opinion. Here’s a typical New York Times headline: “World opinion of the U.S. and Trump is in a tailspin as the pandemic persists
column5: a Pew poll finds.”  The moral significance of World Opinion is zero.
